traits.name: Fey Touched
entries: Magic can't put the faevlin to sleep. Only a creature of the fey type can cause the faevlin to become {@condition charmed}, and a faevlin always knows if a nonfey creature attempted to render it {@condition charmed}.

traits.name: Sneaky
entries: The faevlin can use a bonus action to take the Hide action.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
